column1: Anatoly Nikolayevich Berezovoy (???????? ?????????? ?????????) is a former Soviet cosmonaut.
Berezovoy was born on April 11, 1942 in Enem, Adyghe Autonomous Oblast, Russian SFSR in a Ukrainian family.
He is married with two children.
He graduated from the Air Force Academy He was selected as a cosmonaut on April 27, 1970.
He flew as Commander on Soyuz T-5.
He retired on October 31, 1992 due to medical reasons after injuries he got as a victim of an armed robbery.
From 1992 to 1999, he was a Deputy President Russian Space Federation.
